mapper.insert: SELECT bandmembers_seq.nextval FROM DUAL insert into bandmembers values(#{memberId}, #{memberBandRoomId}, #{memberUserId}, #{memberProfileId}, #{memberStatus})
mapper.select: select a.* ,b.bandroom_name ,b.cover_image_url from (select m.member_bandroom_id ,m.member_id from bandmembers m where member_user_id = #{userId}) a join bandrooms b on a.member_bandroom_id = b.bandroom_id
mapper.update: update bandmembers set member_status = #{memberStatus} where member_id = #{memberId}
mapper.select: select * from bandmembers b left join profiles p on b.member_profile_id = p.profile_id where member_bandroom_id = #{bandRoomId} and member_status = 'accept'
select count(*) from bandmembers where member_bandroom_id = #{memberBandRoomId} and member_status = 'accept'
select * from bandmembers b left join profiles p on b.member_profile_id = p.profile_id where member_bandroom_id = #{bandRoomId} and member_status = 'request'
